Package org.apache.wayang.core.util

Class Bitmask

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.util.Bitmask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Iterable<Integer>
public class Bitmask extends Object implements Cloneable, Iterable<Integer>
A mutable bit-mask.
